basics.label: Senior Director of Finance
basics.summary: High-performing Senior Director of Finance with management experience, and exceptional people skills. Versed in strategic planning, financial analysis and project management.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managing a team responsible for timely and accurate reporting for Commercial Accounts ($3.5BN) and Middle Market ($7BN) monthly and quarterly production results, including preparing Sr. Leadership for Investor Days, Earnings Releases, and Shareholder Meetings.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed strategy, identified priorities, and established business cases across and within the businesses to enable the successful delivery of strategic activities and investments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Completed a Liquid Petroleum Gas market study for National Programs, conducted an Account Manager job-assessment for Northland Insurance and managed different process improvement projects.
